comments.body: Presumably you want this to be [Feature:UbernetesLite] or something similar?  See https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/docs/devel/e2e-tests.md#kinds-of-tests.

No, this is actually core functionality, and one of the main features of our upcoming 1.2 release. 
The code on line 45 causes the tests to be automatically skipped on non-multi-zone clusters (which all our test clusters except one - "ubernetes-lite" - are, currently).
As soon as all our e2e tests have proved to be stable against multi-zone clusters (they are all currently passing as we speak), I intend to add the "ubernetes-lite" multi-zone test cluster to the list of merge-queue blocking test clusters.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@)

var _ = Describe("Ubernetes Lite", func() {
	framework := NewFramework("ubernetes-lite")
	var zoneCount int
